import React from 'react' import "./cartItem.css" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from 'react' const CartItem = ({item, qtyChangeHandler,removeCartItem}) => { const [price , setPrice] = useState(0); return (

{item.name}

${item.price}

{item.product ? ( <> ): <> }
) } export default CartItem
